alert.note: Alert for Ionia; Kent; Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:53PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Kent, northwestern Ionia and south central Montcalm Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rockford, or 10 miles northeast of Grand Rapids, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville... Stanton... Belding... Rockford... Grattan... Orleans... Sidney... Sheridan... Wells Airport... Belmont... Northview... Palo... Murray Lake... Fenwick... Greenville Municipal... Smyrna... Cannonsburg... Kings Corner... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
